programme.title: TFC Kids Zone
programme.desc: A programme block filled with animated short stories, nursery rhymes and songs, as well as Filipino language lessons, TFC Kids' Zone promises a rich treasure trove of learning and discovery that parents and their young ones will find enriching and empowering.

programme.title: Roja
programme.desc: A paradise like no other - La Playa Roja is your ultimate escape! But behind its beauty lies danger, and soon, you'll see RED. Are you ready for the fight to survive?

programme.title: FPJ's Batang Quiapo
programme.desc: A young man rises to be one of the biggest outlaws in the neighbourhood while he navigates his way in life to survive in Quiapo. Hoping to earn the affection of his parents, his feat draws him closer to the truth about his identity.

programme.title: What Lies Beneath
programme.desc: The lives of four individuals are turned upside down after they witness the murder of their friend. They band together to put the alleged killer behind bars, but years later, the imprisoned man seeks revenge, unraveling dark secrets that test their loyalty and survival.

programme.title: Goin' Bulilit S15
programme.desc: This comical spin-off of the 80s comedy programme Goin' Bananas is currently the Philippines' most successful children's comedy show, created and directed by one of Goin' Bananas' original stars, Bobot Mortiz.

programme.desc: The life of a simple flower farm girl is shattered when she falls for a charming accountant, who turns out to be a married gun cartel member. Targeted for his stolen money, she loses everything she holds dear and reinvents herself to seek justice.

programme.desc: Being a prominent political clan, the Sagrados want nothing but to keep their name faultless and sacred, until a controversial incident comes their way.

programme.desc: Mara dies a mysterious death while abroad. When her body is brought home for burial, strange deaths also loom in her hometown.

programme.title: Cayetano in Action with Boy Abunda
programme.desc: Senator Alan Peter Cayetano and host Boy Abunda engage in insightful conversations on current events, social issues, and interviews with various guests. The show combines thought-provoking discussions with entertainment, offering diverse perspectives on important topics.

programme.title: Tiktoclock: Happy Hour Na
programme.desc: A game-variety show showcasing talents of Filipinos in singing, dancing and many more.

programme.title: Unica Hija
programme.desc: The tragic death of his daughter and the ensuing breakdown of his marriage leads a scientist to clone his daughter, with the hope of bringing his wife back to him. However, others take interest in his daring but morally questionable experiment, leading to his demise. Bianca, the clone, is taken in by an unsuspecting couple, and is raised as their own. Years later, the cloning is discovered. Bianca

programme.title: Cruz vs. Cruz
programme.desc: is a story of the two families of Ryan Cruz. He left his original family in the Philippines to work abroad and provide for them. During his time as an OFW, he meets a woman who lures him to marry her after she gets pregnant.

programme.title: Hating Kapatid
programme.desc: The series follows twin siblings Tyron and Belle, separated at birth and raised in vastly different worlds. When fate brings them together, their bond sparks a journey of discovery, love, and rivalry-- unaware of the truth that binds them.

programme.title: Sanggang-Dikit FR
programme.desc: Two law-enforcers, each burdened by personal loss, are forced to work together when a high-profile murder implicates an action star. Their investigation unravels a deeper conspiracy linking their own families to the crimes, testing their loyalty, trust, and pursuit of justice.

programme.title: Encantadia Chronicles: Sang'gre
programme.desc: The series is a spin-off to the Philippine television fantasy drama series, Encantadia.

programme.title: Family Feud
programme.desc: It features two families who compete to name the most popular answers to survey questions in order to win cash and prizes.

programme.title: Reporter's Notebook
programme.desc: Features stories culled from the reporters' own files, news that people did not see on the news programs. The show is written and hosted by the network's aggressive young reporters and hosted by the network.

programme.desc: Features the lighter side of veteran journalist, Jessica Soho, and highlights insightful stories of a wide range of topics.

programme.title: Lumuhod ka sa Lupa Bagong Yugto ep 97
programme.desc: The saga continues in the second season/installment of the classic Carlo J. Caparas' adaptation. Stars Kiko Estrada, Sarah Labahti, and Gardo Versoza.

programme.title: Lumuhod ka sa Lupa Bagong Yugto ep 98
programme.desc: The saga continues in the second season/installment of the classic Carlo J. Caparas' adaptation. Stars Kiko Estrada, Sarah Labahti, and Gardo Versoza.

programme.title: Minsan Pa Natin Hagkan ang Nakaraan ep 2
programme.desc: A woman who was severely broken by her greatest love finds love again in an older man who did everything to put her back together. Just when she thought her life is finally back to normal, her greatest love comes back, determined to work for her forgiveness and win her back—even if it means breaking her family apart.

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 147
programme.desc: Totoy Bato explores the origins, the pathos of the character Totoy. All the different battle he went through (terrorist, revenge for his wife, corruption, prejudice and for love) defines him as a character.

programme.title: Da Pers Family ep 28
programme.desc:
A story of a couple who preserves the family 
bakery business legacy from closure. Now the 
couple’s children, volunteers to step in and help the 
business. Are the parents willing to accept change 
and innovations of the new generation?

programme.title: Para sa Isa't Isa ep 11
programme.desc: Zion gets another shot at repairing his relationship with his wife, Erin by a wish on a well to go back in time. But he finds Erin not knowing him at all. He must now correct his mistakes and make her fall in love with him again.

programme.title: Mga Kwentong Epik: Maria Makiling ep 6
programme.desc: Live action series of original Epik superheroes and comic book characters.

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S1 ep 7
programme.desc: A clairvoyant repairman fearful of ghosts is forced to help them cross over so they can leave him in peace. On his journey of helping these ghosts with their unfinished businesses, he ends up getting into trouble with their families, friends and the community they are all living in. Will he be able to get these ghosts and their love ones, at the same time face his fear of them?

programme.title: Afterlife ep 7
programme.desc: Peter, a deceased Filipino-Chinese businessman, returns as a ghost and is bonded to Romy, a Filipino caretaker of a Chinese temple. He sets out to let his family know the whole truth through Romy.

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 148
programme.desc: Totoy Bato explores the origins, the pathos of the character Totoy. All the different battle he went through (terrorist, revenge for his wife, corruption, prejudice and for love) defines him as a character.

programme.title: Minsan Pa Natin Hagkan ang Nakaraan ep 3
programme.desc: A woman who was severely broken by her greatest love finds love again in an older man who did everything to put her back together. Just when she thought her life is finally back to normal, her greatest love comes back, determined to work for her forgiveness and win her back—even if it means breaking her family apart.

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 10
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING \u0026 DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other

programme.title: Carpool ep 3
programme.desc: Carpool' revolves around four individuals whose lives get thrown into chaos after sharing a carpool ride which ended up in a tragic accident. A streak of unfortunate events seemingly taking them down.

programme.title: Minsan Pa Natin Hagkan ang Nakaraan ep 3
programme.desc: A woman who was severely broken by her greatest love finds love again in an older man who did everything to put her back together. Just when she thought her life is finally back to normal, her greatest love comes back, determined to work for her forgiveness and win her back—even if it means breaking her family apart.

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 148
programme.desc: Totoy Bato explores the origins, the pathos of the character Totoy. All the different battle he went through (terrorist, revenge for his wife, corruption, prejudice and for love) defines him as a character.

programme.title: The Last Woman Standing ep 5
programme.desc: After the death of his wife, a man's four mistresses compete against one another to become his next wife, as his wife's ghost continues to haunt them.

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S1 ep 7
programme.desc: A clairvoyant repairman fearful of ghosts is forced to help them cross over so they can leave him in peace. On his journey of helping these ghosts with their unfinished businesses, he ends up getting into trouble with their families, friends and the community they are all living in. Will he be able to get these ghosts and their love ones, at the same time face his fear of them?

programme.title: Para sa Isa't Isa ep 11
programme.desc: Zion gets another shot at repairing his relationship with his wife, Erin by a wish on a well to go back in time. But he finds Erin not knowing him at all. He must now correct his mistakes and make her fall in love with him again.

programme.title: Mga Kwentong Epik: Maria Makiling ep 6
programme.desc: Live action series of original Epik superheroes and comic book characters.

programme.title: Afterlife ep 7
programme.desc: Peter, a deceased Filipino-Chinese businessman, returns as a ghost and is bonded to Romy, a Filipino caretaker of a Chinese temple. He sets out to let his family know the whole truth through Romy.

programme.title: Beh Buti Nga ep 11
programme.desc: After making a fortune from Bitcoin, Axel gets back at the girls who once broke his heart. When he succeeds, he makes it a mission to help his high school barkada to become confident heartbreakers. However, things take a turn when Isabelle their only female friend in high school starts forming a bond with Axel and he falls in love with her for real.

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Hindi Pa Tapos ang Laban
programme.desc: Fernando Poe Jr. stars as Carding Villamar, a city professional who returns to their hometown of Evangelista after learning of his brother's untimely demise. He was shot in cold blood for refusing to sell his land to a powerful congressman. With a town muted and crippled by

programme.desc: The saga continues in the second season/installment of the classic Carlo J. Caparas' adaptation. Stars Kiko Estrada, Sarah Labahti, and Gardo Versoza.

programme.title: Da Pers Family ep 28
programme.desc:
A story of a couple who preserves the family 
bakery business legacy from closure. Now the 
couple’s children, volunteers to step in and help the 
business. Are the parents willing to accept change 
and innovations of the new generation?

programme.title: The Mysterious Case of Bea Montenegro ep 1
programme.desc: A Sari-Sari Original Series. Hot off the heels from her last cold case, investigative journalist Christine Del Mundo (Maui Taylor) is back with a brand new cold case. This time, it involves actress Bea Montenegro, whose death has only brought forth one suspect - a fellow model who suffers from face blindness.

programme.title: Afterlife ep 7
programme.desc: Peter, a deceased Filipino-Chinese businessman, returns as a ghost and is bonded to Romy, a Filipino caretaker of a Chinese temple. He sets out to let his family know the whole truth through Romy.

programme.title: From the Beautiful Country ep 1
programme.desc: A Sari-Sari original series. Four beauty pageant contestants find themselves prime suspects when another contestant winds up dead. Each girl has her motive, but which one of them did it? And which one will end up with the crown?

programme.title: Carpool ep 3
programme.desc: Carpool' revolves around four individuals whose lives get thrown into chaos after sharing a carpool ride which ended up in a tragic accident. A streak of unfortunate events seemingly taking them down.

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 10
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING \u0026 DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other

programme.title: For the Love ep 8
programme.desc: An episodic TV series touching on various kinds of love stories based on modern hits and classics from Viva Records.

programme.title: LIVE Ted Failon DJ Cha Cha Sa Radyo 5
Tiktoclock: Happy Hour Na
programme.desc: A game-variety show showcasing talents of Filipinos in singing, dancing and many more.

programme.title: Unica Hija
programme.desc: The tragic death of his daughter and the ensuing breakdown of his marriage leads a scientist to clone his daughter, with the hope of bringing his wife back to him. However, others take interest in his daring but morally questionable experiment, leading to his demise. Bianca, the clone, is taken in by an unsuspecting couple, and is raised as their own. Years later, the cloning is discovered. Bianca

programme.title: Cruz Vs. Cruz
programme.desc: is a story of the two families of Ryan Cruz. He left his original family in the Philippines to work abroad and provide for them. During his time as an OFW, he meets a woman who lures him to marry her after she gets pregnant.

programme.title: Hating Kapatid
programme.desc: The series follows twin siblings Tyron and Belle, separated at birth and raised in vastly different worlds. When fate brings them together, their bond sparks a journey of discovery, love, and rivalry-- unaware of the truth that binds them.

programme.title: Sanggang
programme.desc: Two law-enforcers, each burdened by personal loss, are forced to work together when a high-profile murder implicates an action star. Their investigation unravels a deeper conspiracy linking their own families to the crimes, testing their loyalty, trust, and pursuit of justice.

programme.title: Encantadia Chronicles: Sang'gre
programme.desc: The series is a spin-off to the Philippine television fantasy drama series, Encantadia.

programme.title: Family Feud
programme.desc: It features two families who compete to name the most popular answers to survey questions in order to win cash and prizes

programme.title: Fast Talk With Boy Abunda
programme.desc: The latest multi-platform showbiz news and talk show on Kapuso network.

programme.title: 24 Oras
programme.desc: Gives an up-to-the minute news here and around the world.

programme.desc: The series is a spin-off to the Philippine television fantasy drama series, Encantadia.

programme.desc: The TV reality competition follows the same premise as its many foreign counterparts around the world wherein a number of Filipinos volunteered to live inside a house for a certain number of days.

programme.title: Saksi
programme.desc: Brings up-to-the-minute news, relentlessly delivering breaking stories and covering live reports.

programme.title: Unang Hirit
programme.desc: A news magazine show that offers humor and information from hard news to special interests segments on travel, health, housekeeping and entertainment.

programme.title: Wish Ko Lang
programme.desc: The first wish-granting program on Philippine television, featuring inspiring stories of ordinary Filipinos as they struggle to overcome extraordinary situations.

programme.title: Born To Be Wild
programme.desc: Adventures that explore the unknown and take viewers to an amazing wildlife encounter.

programme.title: Daig Kayo Ng Lola Ko
programme.desc: About a stereotypical grandmother who is kind, loving and attentive. Unknown to many, she is benevolent keeper of an extraordinary and mystical family secret.

programme.title: Saksi
programme.desc: Brings up-to-the-minute news, relentlessly delivering breaking stories and covering live reports.

programme.title: Sanggang
programme.desc: Two law-enforcers, each burdened by personal loss, are forced to work together when a high-profile murder implicates an action star. Their investigation unravels a deeper conspiracy linking their own families to the crimes, testing their loyalty, trust, and pursuit of justice.

programme.title: Reporter's Notebook
programme.desc: Features stories culled from the reporters' own files, news that people did not see on the news programs. The show is written and hosted by the network's aggressive young reporters and hosted by the network.

programme.title: Kapuso Mo Jessica Soho
programme.desc: Features the lighter side of veteran journalist, Jessica Soho, and highlights insightful stories of a wide range of topics

programme.title: Hating Kapatid
programme.desc: The series follows twin siblings Tyron and Belle, separated at birth and raised in vastly different worlds. When fate brings them together, their bond sparks a journey of discovery, love, and rivalry-- unaware of the truth that binds them.

programme.title: It's Showtime
programme.desc: 'It's Showtime' is a hit variety program that thrives on spontaneity and animated conversations.

programme.title: Send In The Clowns
programme.desc: Tito, Vic and Joey play the brothers Roberto, Icardo, and Rodrigo. Tired of getting fired from different odd jobs, they decide to make use of their ability to make people laugh by working as clowns in a carnival.

programme.title: Boy Negro
programme.desc: Called Negro because of his dark skin, Boy was a stowaway in a ship going to Manila when he met some corrupt law enforcers who turned him into a petty thief and informer. Forced to survive on his own, he willingly did all they asked him to do.

programme.title: Swindler's List
programme.desc: Leo and Niño were the swindlers in this wacky tale. But only because of a very good reason: to provide a home for the orphanage. The duo decided to raise money by swindling the rich to give to the poor.

programme.title: I Love You Sabado
programme.desc: Heaven makes mistakes too. Janno was killed before his time and must be sent back to earth. However, the Chief Angel found out that he was due to die in one week's time, or next Saturday or Sabado and he would go to hell.

programme.title: Alabok Sa Ulap (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Winston is smitten with Eva's beauty and decides to pursue her without knowing that Dom is secretly in love with her. But for how long will Dom be able to conceal the love that he is keeping deep inside of him?

programme.title: Lagablab Sa Paraiso
programme.desc: A nurse and her cousin, a nightclub dancer, a honeymooning couple and two male prisoners. Survivors of a shipwreck, they are trapped together in an island. Of different backgrounds and personalities, can they set aside their differences to survive roughing it up in this island?

programme.title: Baby Paterno (Dugong Pulis)
programme.desc: Baby Paterno (Roi Vinzon) comes from a well to do family. He is a womanizer and a partygoer who always ends up in trouble. Later on, he proves to be a good law enforcer. He tries to uncover serious crimes only to find out that the head of the syndicate is his superior.

programme.title: Grease Gun Brothers
programme.desc: Better known as the Grease Gun Brothers. Ramon (Dante Varona) and his brothers Rodrigo (Rey Malonzo), Romeo (Bembol Roco) and Renato (Roy Flores) play modern-day Robin Hoods to their urban poor community.

programme.title: Bitag (Babae at Bala)
programme.desc: Sgt. Nick Nobleza (Jestoni Alarcon) is the straightest cop in the police force. He is assigned to infiltrate the drug syndicate of Mr. Villafuerte. But Mr. Villafuerte is one step ahead as he sets up a trap of his own.

programme.title: Hati Tayo Sa Magdamag
programme.desc: Gerry and Rochelle are childhood sweethearts. Although Rochelle wants to settle down, Gerry wants his ambitions fulfilled first. The couple's relationship is threatened by the arrival of their childhood friend Tonette.

programme.title: Marami Ka Pang Kakaining Bigas
programme.desc: Eddie Garcia played a veteran cop who rose from the ranks and who survived by his wits. Joko Diaz, on the other hand, was a young graduate from the police academy who did everything by the book.

programme.title: Cara Y Cruz
programme.desc: Berting was an escaped convict. Boggart was a cab driver whom he took hostage when he bolted from jail. The two of them landed in a primitive island where all of the inhabitants were under the control of a religious cult.

programme.title: Gloria, Gloria Labandera
programme.desc: Gloria is the pretty and super sexy laundry-woman who works for a rich young couple. It turns out that her male employer is sick and tired of his wife's negative ways, so he decides to use Gloria to rile her.

programme.title: Biktima
programme.desc: The first time their paths crossed, they are virtual enemies – Becca (Sharon Cuneta) is the relentless prosecutor while Jing (Christopher de Leon) is the jittery accused.

programme.title: Humanap Ka Ng Panget (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Andrew E made his acting debut in this wacky comedy based on his big hit \"Humanap Ka ng Panget\". The message of the song is that if you want to be happy it is best to fall in love with an ugly woman or man who will be grateful for your love and will do anything you want.

programme.title: The Grepor \"Butch\" Belgica Story
programme.desc: Joko Diaz attained a stardom in his portrayal of notorious teen-age convict Butch Belgica. He essayed the role of the rich, spoiled teen-ager whose deadly capers made it in the front pages of the newspapers during the 60's.

programme.title: Forever
programme.desc: Mikee had led a charmed life. Now she was engaged to marry the man who was considered by her rich parents as the most suitable for their daughter. But Mikee wanted more out of life.

programme.title: Anabelle Huggins Story, Ruben Ablaza Tragedy
programme.desc: The abduction and rape of pretty Annabelle Huggins was one of the most sensational crimes of the 60's. The movie bit player was kidnapped by jeepney driver, Ruben Ablaza, whom many believed was obssesed with her.

programme.title: Kolehiyala
programme.desc: Three girls in their first year of college face varied but equally difficult problems. They lead their lives very different from the country's perception of the \"kolehiyala\" as a young, innocent girl.

programme.title: Silang Mga Sisiw Sa Lansangan
programme.desc: Four kids stow away from home and became streetchildren. A philantrophist adopted them and treated them as his family until they were held hostages. The kidnapping became news headline which eventually made their parents to know their where-abouts.

programme.title: Wooly Booly (Ang Classmate Kong Alien)
programme.desc: Wooly Booly was an alien stranded on earth. A family took him in and a request to his superiors from another planet granted him an almost human appearance.

programme.title: Gagay, Prinsesa Ng Brownout
programme.desc: This is the Cinderella story for the brown-out plagued generation of this country. Gagay and her family gathered wood which they made into coal. Though they were poor, they already saw some improvement in their lives.
